Events.OnCreate:
(block ( (playerLevel (korGetPlayerLevel))
(dockedFreighters (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "sHZ O:docked; +commonwealth; +freighter;")) (freighterCount (count dockedFreighters)) (qualifyCount (count (filter dockedFreighters theFreighter (and (geq playerLevel (objGetStaticData theFreighter "korolovMinLevel")) (geq (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip) (+ (shpGetMaxSpeed theFreighter) 2)) ) ) ))
(validDestinations (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "TAF +populated; -occupation; -uncharted; -outlaws;"))
gateObj escortType )
(switch ; Finite number of missions per station (ls (objGetData aOwnerObj 'remainingMissions) 1) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Only offer to new pilots and levels 1-3 (not (find '(0 1 2 3) playerLevel)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; No missions once the stronghold is destroyed (objIsAbandoned (objGetObjRefData aOwnerObj 'charonStronghold)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; If we're too close to the gates then no mission (not (setq gateObj (random (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "GR:300; -uncharted;")))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Only allow freighters which are slower than the player ship (not (setq escortType (random (filter (korFreighterTypes playerLevel) theType (geq (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip) (+ (typGetProperty theType 'maxSpeed) 2)) )))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; If there are no freighters we're qualified to escort, or only 1-2 total, then offer mission (or (= qualifyCount 0) (ls freighterCount 2) (and (ls freighterCount 3) (= (random 1 3) 1)) (not validDestinations)) (block ( (escortData (korCalculateCargo escortType playerLevel True)) )
; Mission settings (msnSetData gSource 'gateID (objGetID gateObj)) (msnSetData gSource 'escortType escortType) (msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 75) (msnSetData gSource 'pricePerContainer (@ escortData 'pricePerContainer)) (msnSetData gSource 'cargoValue (@ escortData 'cargoValue)) (msnSetData gSource 'reward (@ escortData 'escortFee))
; Remember the minimum player level to escort and the minimum ; player speed. (msnSetData gSource 'minPlayerLevel (typGetStaticData escortType "korolovMinLevel")) (msnSetData gSource 'minPlayerSpeed (+ (typGetProperty escortType 'maxSpeed) 2)) )
; No mission available (msnDestroy gSource) ) )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block ( (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (gateTime (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance gPlayerShip gateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) (roll (random 1 100)) )
(switch ; 60% of the time we use the standard Charon transport raid (leq roll 60) (msnSetData gSource 'attackRoll 1)
; 20% of the time pirates follow the transport through the gate (leq roll 80) (msnSetData gSource 'attackRoll 2)
; 20% of time there are pirates waiting at the gate (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'attackRoll 3) (msnFireEvent gSource 'CreateGatePirates) ) )
(objSetKnown gateObj) (sysAddObjTimerEvent (add gateTime 300) gSource "OnFreighterArrives") )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch ; If we have a freighter ID, then escort it. (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) 'escort)
; Otherwise, point to the stargate (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID)) 'dock) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch (= aDestroyReason 'enteredStargate) Nil
; If the ship dies, mission fails (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'playerDestroyedFreighter (and gPlayerShip (= aOrderGiver gPlayerShip))) (msnFailure gSource) )
(= (objGetData aObjDestroyed 'mission) (msnGetProperty gSource 'id)) (msnIncData gSource 'attackersLeft -1) )
Events.OnObjDocked: (switch ; If a freighter on a mission docked, then mission is successful (and (= (objGetID aObjDocked) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (= (objGetID aDockTarget) (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) ) (block Nil (objSetData aObjDocked "korolovPlayerEscort" Nil) (msnSuccess gSource) ) )
Events.CreateGatePirates:
(block ( (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (cargoValue (msnGetData gSource 'cargoValue)) num ) (switch (leq cargoValue 75000) (setq num (random 3 4)) (leq cargoValue 150000) (setq num (random 5 7)) (leq cargoValue 300000) (setq num (random 7 9)) (leq cargoValue 600000) (setq num (random 7 11)) (setq num (random 8 14)) )
(for i 1 num (block (enemyObj) (setq enemyObj (sysCreateShip &tbKorolovEscortPirates; gateObj &svPirates;)) (objSetData enemyObj 'mission (msnGetProperty gSource 'id)) (shpOrder enemyObj 'patrol gateObj 15) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource enemyObj) (msnIncData gSource 'attackersLeft 1) )) )
Events.OrderAttackFreighter: (block ((freighterObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)))) (enum (filter (sysFindObject gSource "sD:mission;") obj (= (objGetData obj 'mission) (msnGetProperty gSource 'id)) ) enemyObj (block Nil (shpCancelOrders enemyObj) (shpOrder enemyObj 'attack freighterObj) ) ) )
